channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There are rubbish bags blocking the fire exit of 35 Portman Square on Portman Mews South near the junction of Portman Street, 12th November
item.description:

item.title: Bedhead still dumped on street, 12th November
item.description:
Large bedhead dumped outside 3 Southborough Road. Message received that it was ‘fixed’ but it’s still there (seems to have been moved slightly) and could fall over and hurt someone.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All street lights out both sides, 12th November
item.description:
All street lights are out on both sides of the road. It's incredibly dark on both sides of the road in the evening. Very dangerous for both cyclists and pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Molesworth Street, Ladywell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Outside 161 Chevening Road NW6, 12th November
item.description:
There is fly-tipped rubbish on the pavement outside 161 Chevening Road, NW6. A cardboard box containing what looks like a printer and other waste has been dumped, along with cardboard packaging and other items. Please arrange for removal.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chevening Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Lumps of pigeon pop all over street on Ranmore path!!!, 12th November
item.description:
Pigeon poo has fell off the roofs and clearing. It’s all hazodous it’s been left like this for weeks maybe over month! Since the storm we last had please can you keep on top of this thank you Ranmore path

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ranmore Path, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in middle of road on crossing point, 12th November
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish left out by local residents all week, 12th November
item.description:
Against local regulations but council action to deal with this has been woefully inadequate - this encourages the constant fly tipping we see in the area

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Smalley Road Estate, Hackney, London

item.title: Missing no entry sign, 12th November
item.description:
--- Issue type: Missing traffic sign Location: Endell Street, WC2 (near the junction where only one “No Entry” sign remains on the right-hand side) Description: The left-hand “No Entry” sign that used to be mounted on the lamppost is missing. Only the right-side sign remains, making the restriction unclear to approaching drivers, especially at night. Please could the missing sign be replaced or reinstated to ensure the restriction is properly marked and visible from both sides. Photo attached for reference.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Shelton Street, Bloomsbury, Camden Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone keeps on dumping rubbish here, 12th November
item.description:
Entire road needs cleaning, and please install CCTV to stop people from littering the area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Leadale Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
